# 𒋭 LAL3 ⇔ 𒇻 LU •lamb

𒄞 GUD
𒋭 good

𒋭 #LAL lolly "sweet, honey, syrup"

𒋭 𒋫 𒄭 TA•ḪI
𒋭 top ţābu (good) 𒋫𒁍 ṭabu "top" good, sweet 𒋫𒄭 ṭābum “pleasant”
𒋭 TA•ḪIᵐ ⵜⴰⵎⵎⵏⵜ tammnt "honey" 𒄭 ḪIⁿ 𓆤 𓏏 𓏌 𓏥

𒋭 ţābu ≈ dišpu 𒁹𒁍 diš-puʳ debora bee-honey, syrup (𒁍 bé bee Bohrer) דְּבַשׁ dvash
𒋭 dišpu ܕܒܫܐ deḇšā דּוּבְשָׁא dûḇšā ⇔ ደምስ dämǝsǝ (ambi) •dembsa dugos "honey"
𒋭 dišpu ⇔ syrup

𒋭 làl syrup, honey ⇔ Šurpu "burning" @ 𒀭𒇽𒋭 lú.làl
𒋭 µlàl ⇔ бал bal عسل 'asál 꿀 kkul 밀 mil miel "honey"

𒋭 #LAL sweet ⇔ 𓇛, 𓎡 𓈖 𓈖 𓆱
𒋭 #LAL syrup, honey 241x ⇔
𒋭 #LAL ⇔ •мом mom موم mum balmumu bal mumu “wax”
𒋭𒄯 lalHAR “wax” Akk. dišpu; matqu; ţābu Malay: lilin !
𒃮𒋭 gaba.lal3 wax #iškuru воскъ voskŭ ⰲⱁⱄⰽⱏ voskŭ wask waks wax
𒃮𒋭 gaba-lal₃ •gabara gavara cwyr ceară ☑ ≈ #iškuru caira cera κερί kerí κηρός kirós ក្រមួន krɑmuən "wax"

𒄑 𒋭𒁱 lal3-dar "pomegranate" ‘sweet red‘ Akk. 𒉡 𒌫𒈠 NU-UR2-MA /nurmû/ Wanderwort!
𒄑 𒋭𒁱 lal3-dar ⇔ दाड़िम dāṛim দাড়িম্ব daṛimbo ডালিম (dalim) দাডিম (dāḍima) ឌាឌិម (km) (diədɨm), ទទឹម (km) (tɔtɨm)
𒄑 𒋭𒁱 lal3-dar ⇔ ডালিম dalim 塗林 MC duo|ɖˠa liɪm 榴 liú ≠ ⲗⲉϩⲙⲉⲛ (lehmen) 𐎍𐎗𐎎𐎐 lrmn, “pomegranate”

𒆷𒁇 LA.bar ⋍ 𒋭 LAL3 "a type of priest"
𒆷𒁇 LA.bar ⋍ 𒇬 LAGAR = LAGAR3 𒊩𒄸 priest, shaman

𒋭𒂊𒊮𒂵 lal3-e-šag4-ga "a priest or cultic functionary" √sacre ?

𒋭𒄯 lal.ḫar lalHAR 1. wax Akk. ʷiškūru
𒋭𒄯 lal.ḫar lalHAR 2.
𒋭𒃻 lal3-ĝar "subterranean waters"

𒋭𒇲 Libelle? (an insect) Akk. lallartu "insect, female mourner, bird".

𒀀𒋭 a-lal3 𒂊𒇷𒂖 e-le-el "a type of wood or a stone" #elallu

honey ⇔ bear

𒊍 AS ≈ عسل ʕásal ⇔ 𒄑𒊍 אָסָא ʾāsā آس ʔās
𒊍 ᵐAS мышъэ məŝe ⇔ ደምስ dämǝsǝ
𒊍 мірт ⇔ ማር mar ⇔ մուրտ медвѣдь medvědĭ "bear"
𒊍 ≈ 𒁕𒁍 dabu דבא debā ድብ dəb ⇔ ܕܒܫܐ deḇšā דּוּבְשָׁא dûḇšā 𒋭 dišpu
